verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Turn <S%H6437><s%> ye <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H457>idols,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> to yourselves <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And <S%H3588>if<s%> ye <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> ye shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> it at your own <S%H7522>will.<s%>

It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> ye <S%H2077>offer<s%> it, and on the <S%H4480>morrow:<s%> <S%H4283><s%> and if aught <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be eaten at <S%H398>all<s%> <S%H398><s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H6292>abominable;<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7521>accepted.<s%>

Therefore every one that <S%H398>eateth<s%> it shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H2490>profaned<s%> <S%H853><s%> the hallowed <S%H6944>thing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>

And when ye <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> wholly <S%H3615>reap<s%> <S%H7114><s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of thy <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleanings<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5953>glean<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H3950>gather<s%> every <S%H6528>grape<s%> of thy <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> thou shalt <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1589>steal,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> deal <S%H3584>falsely,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8266>lie<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H5997>another.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> neither shalt thou <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of thy <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6231>defraud<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1497>rob<s%> him: the <S%H6468>wages<s%> of him that is <S%H7916>hired<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> abide with thee all <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> the <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> but shalt fear thy <S%H3372>God:<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>respect<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1921>honor<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H1419>mighty:<s%> but in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shalt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> thy <S%H5997>neighbor.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go up and <S%H1980>down<s%> as a <S%H7400>talebearer<s%> among thy <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H7453>neighbor:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart:<s%> thou shalt in any wise <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> <S%H3198><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>suffer<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5358>avenge,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> bear any <S%H5201>grudge<s%> <S%H853>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> but thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> as <S%H3644>thyself:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H2708>statutes.<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> let thy <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H7250>engender<s%> with a diverse <S%H3610>kind:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field<s%> with mingled <S%H3610>seed:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall a <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H3610>mingled<s%> of linen and <S%H8162>woolen<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee.

And <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H7902>carnally<s%> <S%H2233><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> a <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is a <S%H8198>bondmaid,<s%> <S%H2778>betrothed<s%> to a <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> at all <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> <S%H6299><s%> <S%H176>nor<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2668>freedom<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> her; she shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1244>scourged;<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she was not <S%H2666>free.<s%> <S%H3808><s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> his trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> even a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H2398>done:<s%> and the <S%H4480>sin<s%> <S%H2403><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H2398>done<s%> shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

And <S%H3588>when<s%> ye shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall have <S%H5193>planted<s%> all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> then ye shall <S%H6188>count<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof as <S%H6189>uncircumcised:<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> shall it <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> unto you: it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> of.
But in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H1974>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> withal.

And in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof, that it may <S%H3254>yield<s%> unto you the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> any thing <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1818>blood:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye use <S%H5172>enchantment,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> observe <S%H6049>times.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5362>round<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H7843>mar<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of thy <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> any <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>print<s%> any <S%H3793>marks<s%> <S%H7085><s%> upon you: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Do <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2490>prostitute<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> to cause her to be a <S%H2181>whore;<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> fall to <S%H2181>whoredom,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> become <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2154>wickedness.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H3372>reverence<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Regard <S%H6437><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> them that have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> to be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> by them: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thou shalt rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the hoary <S%H7872>head,<s%> and <S%H1921>honor<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the old <S%H2205>man,<s%> and fear thy <S%H3372>God:<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee in your <S%H776>land,<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3238>vex<s%> him.

But the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>dwelleth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto you as one born <S%H249>among<s%> <S%H4480><s%> you, and thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> him as <S%H3644>thyself;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> in <S%H4060>meteyard,<s%> in <S%H4948>weight,<s%> or in <S%H4884>measure.<s%>

Just <S%H6664><s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weights,<s%> a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1969>hin,<s%> shall ye <S%H1961>have:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
